mapper.select: SELECT id,nickname,headimg FROM t_app_user WHERE pub_flag=1 AND authed=1 AND nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')
SELECT id,material_name,material_url,material_type,file_size,create_time FROM t_material WHERE user_id = #{id} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id,material_name,material_url,material_type,file_size,create_time FROM t_material WHERE user_id = #{masterId} ORDER BY create_time DESC limit 3

SELECT tm.id,meet_name,meet_type,start_time,end_time,state,ta.nickname AS organizer,ta.headimg FROM t_meet tm LEFT JOIN t_meet_prop tp ON tm.id = tp.meet_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user ta ON ta.id = tm.owner_id WHERE owner_id = #{masterId} AND tm.state >0 AND tm.state <4 ORDER BY publish_time DESC

SELECT tu.id,nickname,headimg,province,city,sign, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_app_attention ta WHERE tu.id = ta.master_id AND ta.slaver_id = #{slaverId}) AS attention, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_app_attention ta WHERE tu.id = ta.master_id) AS attentionNum, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_material tm WHERE tm.user_id = tu.id)AS materialNum FROM t_app_user tu WHERE tu.id = #{masterId}
SELECT count(tu.id) FROM t_app_user tu INNER JOIN t_app_attention ta ON tu.id = ta.slaver_id WHERE tu.role_id = 2 AND ta.master_id = #{userId}

SELECT tu.id,nickname,headimg, (SELECT COUNT(ta.id) FROM t_app_attention ta WHERE ta.master_id = tu.id AND ta.slaver_id = #{userId}) AS attention FROM t_app_user tu WHERE tu.authed = 1 AND tu.pub_flag = 1 AND tu.tuijian = 1

SELECT count(tu.id) FROM t_app_user tu INNER JOIN t_app_attention ta ON tu.id = ta.slaver_id LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group tudg ON tudg.doctor_id = tu.id AND tudg.pub_user_id = #{userId} LEFT JOIN t_user_group tug ON tug.id = tudg.group_id AND tug.pub_user_id = tudg.pub_user_id WHERE tu.role_id = 2 AND ta.master_id = #{userId} AND tug.id is null
SELECT * FROM t_app_user WHERE username = #{loginName} OR mobile = #{loginName} limit 1

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.linkman, u.mobile, u.regist_date, u.province, u.city, ud.unit_name as hospital FROM t_app_user u INNER JOIN t_app_user_detail ud ON u.id = ud.user_id WHERE ud.unit_name = #{unitName}
AND ( u.username like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR u.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR u.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') OR u.linkman like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%') )
